meanings.definition: One who aborts a mission or plan.
meanings.sent1: The aborter decided to cancel the mission due to bad weather.
meanings.sent2: The team leader was the aborter of the plan to hike up the mountain.
meanings.sent3: The aborter of the camping trip forgot to pack the tents!
meanings.sent4: The sudden thunderstorm acted as the aborter of our outdoor picnic.
meanings.sent5: The aborter's decision saved us from walking into danger.

meanings.definition: A person or thing that causes an abortion.
meanings.sent1: The medication acted as the aborter in terminating the pregnancy.
meanings.sent2: The doctor identified the infection as the aborter of the fetus.
meanings.sent3: The rabbit's nibbling on the garden plants played the role of the aborter.
meanings.sent4: The faulty equipment served as the aborter of the successful pregnancy.
meanings.sent5: The aborter's presence led to the unfortunate outcome.

meanings.definition: A device or substance used to induce abortion.
meanings.sent1: The clinic provided the aborter to terminate the unwanted pregnancy.
meanings.sent2: The illegal market sold the aborter to desperate individuals.
meanings.sent3: The prankster mistakenly thought the aborter was a harmless tool.
meanings.sent4: The powerful aborter swiftly ended the pregnancy.
meanings.sent5: The aborter's effect was immediate and irreversible.
